item.title: Resume
item.description: Experience Software Engineer intern iFOLIO | Summer 2020 Maintained, added features to, and fixed bugs on massive SaaS PHP web application with 1000â€™s of users. Participated in sales calls as sales engineer to answer any technical questions and work with clients to find the best solution for them. Refactored frontend of application from PHP/Vue.js to React. Utilized AWS to set up and host an Nginx server and SQL database to allow online development.
